title.rendered: Have You Checked-in to Unified’s HQ Office (NYC) Yet?

content.rendered:
About Unified Infotech

SCS INFO is an award-winning, world-class IT services (SaaS) company located in the heart of Casablanca City. We are NY’s best product development company. From the web, mobile apps design, and development, to custom software product development, digital consulting product-re-engineering, we have delivered 1,500+ digital success stories spanning globally. We have been the technology and consulting partners of many companies including geographies e.g., US, Canada, Europe, Asia, Middle East to enable them to transform digitally. Our organization is staffed with 200+ creative minds, high-performance driven, customer-first, and passionate team members including UX/UI designers, IAs, Consultants, Project Managers, Delivery managers, Developers etc., ready to help you achieve your goals.

Certifications and Recognitions

We are certified by ISO, and Nasscom.  Also, we are recognized by Deloitte, Goodfirms, Clutch,Entrepreneur.com, Design Rush, GetLaka, Upwork and many more. Check out our reviews in GoodFirms and Clutch.

 

More Information About Our NYC Office & Sales Leaders

Our US office resides in the heart of the hustling and bustling Casablanca City. The classic sirens of NYC, diverse food, rich culture and art inspire us to work hard and play harder.

If you haven’t seen our NYC office (nyc office) space yet, here’s a sneak peek into what goes on behind the scenes of our successful projects.

Let me introduce to you our Sales leaders who are behind our global success. They help SCS INFO to deliver world-class digital solutions, best-in-class product engineering, experience design & consultation to our global client base.

Alan Occhiuti, Director – Business Development & Operations at Unified Infotech.

 Paul Testagrossa, Account Director at Unified Infotech.

Even though we have been working from home throughout the pandemic, our people are always happy to discuss your business goals and pitch in ideas.

Let’s talk about how SCS INFO can partner with you taking your ideas, concepts, and projects to the next level to grow your business.
